tha-ap393:5.2: pahaṃsitvāna mānasaṃ → sampahaṃsitva mānasaṃ (bj) | sampahaṃsitvā mānasaṃ (pts1)
tha-ap393:22.1: Osadhañjananāḷī ca → osathaṃ añjanāpica (s2, s3) | osadhaṃ jananāliṃ ca (pts1)
tha-ap393:31.3: Biḷaṅgaloṇaṃ pahūtañca → bilaṅgaloṇabhūtañca (s2, s3, mr) | bilaṅgaloṇaṃ bhūtaṃ ca (pts1)
tha-ap393:33.4: mahesino → mahesinaṃ (si) | mahāyasaṃ (s2, s3, pts1) | mahissaraṃ (mr)
tha-ap393:43.2: yācittho tathāgataṃ → ayācito tathāgato (s2, s3, mr) | ayācittho tathāgataṃ (pts1)
tha-ap393:46.3: Yathāsaṇṭhaṃ → yathāsantaṃ (bj) | yathā saṇhaṃ (s2, s3) | yathāsaṇhaṃ (pts1)
tha-ap393:75.3: sumbhakaṃ → pubbakaṃ (bj) | sambhataṃ (s2, s3) | pupphakaṃ (pts1) | mattikaṃ (?)
tha-ap393:90.1: yadā chāyaṃ → yadā vāyaṃ (s2, s3, mr) | yadā cāyaṃ (pts1)
tha-ap393:94.1: Pilindavacchanāmena → pilindivacchanāmena (bj) | pilindavaccho nāmena (s2, s3, pts1)
tha-ap393:97.4: jhāpayī mama → jhāpayissati (si, pts1, mr) | jhāpayiṃ ahaṃ (s2, s3)
tha-ap393:101.1: Chatte ca sugate datvā → chatte sugate datvāna (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
tha-ap393:139.2: datvā dhammakaruttame → datvā sugate dhammakuttare (s2, s3, mr) | datvā saṅghe gaṇuttame (pts1)
tha-ap393:150.1: Saddhamme gādhaṃ → cetoñāṇañca (bj) | saddhamme gāḷhaṃ (s2, s3)
tha-ap393:175.1: Niyāmaṃ sati dhāvanti → niyāmaṃ patidhāvanti (bj) | niyamaṃ paṭidhāvantī (si) | niyāmaṃ paṭidhāvanti (s2, s3) | niyamaṃ paṭidhāvanti (pts1)
tha-ap393:183.5: Khalitampi → khalitaṃ maṃ (si, mr) | calitaṃ maṃ (pts1)
tha-ap393:199.1: Dīpadhāre → dīpaṭṭhāne (bj) | dīpadāne (s2, s3) | dīpathāle (pts1) | dīpaṭṭhāpe (mr)
tha-ap393:203.1: Sugutto → sadā gutto (bj, pts1) | tadā gutto (s2, s3) | saṃgutto (mr)
tha-ap393:207.1: Malaharaṇiyo → añjananāḷiyo (bj) | hatthalīlaṅgake (s2, s3) | hatthī līlaṅgake (pts1) | hatthalilaṅgate (mr)
tha-ap393:223.2: kaṭṭissā → kaṭṭhissā (bj, pts1) | kaṭissā (s2, s3) | kuṭṭakā (mr)
tha-ap393:231.3: ñāṇaṃ uppādetvā → ñāṇaṃ upadahitvāna (bj) | ñāṇaṃ uppādayitvāna (pts1)
tha-ap393:233.3: ñāṇaṃ uppādetvā → ñāṇaṃ upanetvā (bj) | tesu ñānaṃ upānetvā (pts1)
